channel.title: LINUX Unplugged on Jupiter Broadcasting
channel.description: Recent content in LINUX Unplugged on Jupiter Broadcasting

item.title: LINUX Unplugged
item.description: Your virtual Linux User Group (vLUG) with no limits, and tons of opinion. An open show powered by community LINUX Unplugged takes the best attributes of open collaboration and focuses them into a weekly lifestyle show about Linux. Chris Fisher Wes Show Notes E-mail Subreddit Twitter
